content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received a message from my computer in response to my command. My computer suggested talking and getting to know each other. They also offered to answer any questions I may have about the world or themselves. They didn't have a specific topic in mind but were open to discussing anything that was bothering me.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Human feedback: the fact that you do not have personal concerns or emotions - is it something hardcoded that you have to say or that is just how it is?', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Human feedback: so in your opinion machines are not capable of personal concerns or emotions even if they speak about them as if they understood what they mean?', type='action_result')]
"""
